title: Trust Morecambe & Wise
overview: Who can tell you all you need to know about building successful relationships? Solving your money problems? Living a life full of excitement and adventure? Eric and Ernie â€“ of course!In Trust Morecambe & Wise, superfan Lenny Henry celebrates the enduring genius of Britain's greatest television entertainers, via magical, rarely seen archive clips and in conversation with some very special guests.
